channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16691] Optimize KeyOnlyFilter by utilizing KeyOnlyCell
item.description: In KeyOnlyFilter#transformCell will return a KeyOnlyCell that have no value or has valueLength as value, current will copy all row keys into a new byte[] and new a KeyValue, we can eliminate the copy and have a wrap KeyOnlyCell that ignore the cell's value.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Nice one.. +1. We can make the new classes also to impl Streamable interface. (Like KeyValue).. Its ok to leave also.. As part of another jira am coming up with a new interface ExtendedCell which unify all other interfaces around server side cells.

We also have KeyOnlyKeyValue and ByteBufferedKeyOnlyKeyValue. It has similar use but it could be created out of a byte[] or BB and not from a cell. This is just local to this filter. So should be fine I think. +1.

+1 overall

Thanks for the patch, binlijin.

Thanks for the reviews.

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-Trunk_matrix #1678 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1678/)

  • (add) hbase-client/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/filter/TestKeyOnlyFilter.java
Thanks very much for the review and commit! Anoop Sam John ramkrishna vasudevan Ted Yu

The following test failure from https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/3729/artifact/patchprocess/patch-unit-hbase-server.txt might be related to the patch:


testKeyOnlyFilter(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.TestFilter)  Time elapsed: 0.025 sec  <<< ERROR!

java.lang.ArrayStoreException: null

	at java.util.ArrayList.toArray(ArrayList.java:408)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.TestFilter.verifyScan(TestFilter.java:1663)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.TestFilter.testKeyOnlyFilter(TestFilter.java:2012)

Please investigate.
Ted Yu going to commit the addendum before a QA. Am sure this will solve it. Locally passed.

I reverted before seeing the addendum.

Isn't this a behavioral change ?

Please get new QA run.

Thanks

Code change is ok. No behave change. It is a test change which is needed now. Now in trunk we have Cell flowing throughout the read path and no KV hard requirement. binlijin Can u prepare a combined patch of the code change and test fix? We can get the QA run then.
Ok, done, see HBASE-16691-master_v2.patch.

-1 overall
